sys_script.name: Can't Insert exising Base

sys_update_version.name: sys_script_4ec641a4c3c02210476fd0dc05013147
sys_update_version.payload:
<?xml version="1.0" encoding="UTF-8"?><record_update sys_domain="global" table="sys_script"><sys_script action="INSERT_OR_UPDATE"><abort_action>false</abort_action><access>package_private</access><action_delete>false</action_delete><action_insert>false</action_insert><action_query>false</action_query><action_update>false</action_update><active>true</active><add_message>false</add_message><advanced>true</advanced><change_fields>false</change_fields><client_callable>false</client_callable><collection/><condition/><description/><execute_function>false</execute_function><filter_condition/><is_rest>false</is_rest><message/><name>Can't Insert exising Base</name><order>100</order><priority>100</priority><rest_method/><rest_method_text/><rest_service/><rest_service_text/><rest_variables/><role_conditions/><script><![CDATA[(function executeRule(current, previous /*null when async*/) {

	// if ( jaExisteRegistroMesmoNome() ) return;

	var grName = new GlideRecord("x_1584301_bases_registrations");

	grName.addQuery('name', current.name);
	grName.addQuery('sys_id', '!=', current.sys_id);
	grName.query();

	//Se eu encontrar um registro com mesmo nome, ent達o n達o posso criar outro registro.

	if (grName.next()) {

		gs.addErrorMessage("You can't create a Base with a existing Name!");
		current.setAbortAction(true);
	}

	var grCityState = new GlideRecord("x_1584301_bases_registrations");

	grCityState.addQuery('city', current.city);
	grCityState.addQuery('city_state', current.city_state);
	grCityState.addQuery('sys_id', '!=', current.sys_id);
	grCityState.query();

	if (grCityState.next()) {

		gs.addErrorMessage("You can't create a Base with a existing City and City State!");
		current.setAbortAction(true);
	}
})(current, previous);]]></script><sys_class_name>sys_script</sys_class_name><sys_created_by>admin</sys_created_by><sys_created_on>2025-02-27 15:16:13</sys_created_on><sys_domain>global</sys_domain><sys_domain_path>/</sys_domain_path><sys_id>4ec641a4c3c02210476fd0dc05013147</sys_id><sys_mod_count>0</sys_mod_count><sys_name>Can't Insert exising Base</sys_name><sys_overrides/><sys_package display_value="Bases " source="x_1584301_bases">af126377c3731210476fd0dc05013117</sys_package><sys_policy/><sys_scope display_value="Bases ">af126377c3731210476fd0dc05013117</sys_scope><sys_update_name>sys_script_4ec641a4c3c02210476fd0dc05013147</sys_update_name><sys_updated_by>admin</sys_updated_by><sys_updated_on>2025-02-27 15:16:13</sys_updated_on><template/><when>before</when></sys_script><sys_translated_text action="delete_multiple" query="documentkey=4ec641a4c3c02210476fd0dc05013147"/></record_update>
